name: Introduction to Intellectual History
description: A course introducing students to the field of Intellectual History and its relation to the larger field of History.

name: Modern Intellectual History
description: A course exploring the history and development of intellectual thought from the Renaissance to the twentieth century.

name: Early Modern Intellectual History
description: A course exploring the history and development of intellectual thought from antiquity to the Renaissance.

name: Comparative Intellectual History
description: A course exploring the history and development of intellectual thought across cultures and time periods.
